post:
Hi there everyone, 
Well.. Decided to go for something a little different here, I'm putting up a Server auction :-P (no, im not making this the next eBay, but thought this was something I hadn't seen on here)

This server is Excess to my needs now i have upgraded one of my servers to an E3-1240. 
Problem is, the server seems to randomly reset at times, sometimes it's fine for a while etc. I'm suspecting it's a small problem (ie, Loose wire) as Chassis Power remains on etc.

Anyway, Lets do this. 

<pre>
1U Supermicro Chassis
Dual Intel Xeon L5420
16GB RAM (DDR2)
2x1TB Hitachi Drives (4 Bay Hotswap)
IPMI
Motherboard: http://www.supermicro.com/products/motherboard/Xeon1333/5000V/X7DVL-i.cfm
Chassis: http://www.supermicro.com/products/system/1U/6015/SYS-6015V-M3.cfm
</pre>

Currently Located @ Quadranet LA - In their Storage Area

If i remember correctly, Drives are approximately 7-8 months old. 
Suit a nice project box, has plenty of guts surprisingly. Just a pain with the Server resetting (more then likely due to vibrations in the racks, wiggling the Wire out of place)


Start Price: $7
Increments: $2 Minimum
BIN Price: $120

End Time: Tuesday 10th Feb 2015 9am EST (NYC, NY)  ( [TIME CLOCK](http://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20150210T09&p0=179&msg=L5420+Server+Auction&csz=1) )
Payment VIA Paypal or Bitpay (Can supply Invoices via WHMCS for this server if requested by Winner)

**Server Must be Removed within 24 Hours after End of Auction. ** (Can help organise shipping etc)

Approximate Measurements when Packed for shipping: [Click Here](http://i.evoburst.com/0208101809-68mp7.png)

Regards,
Ryan B
